title: Customer sign up for mobile pay-Point of Sale
text: When a customer contacts us that they want to use mobilepay services on POS,the first step is that the customer must register the store on mobilepay portal. The sign up link is shared as below and the customer uses their own credientals in order to get registered on the portal. https://portal.mobilepay.dk/ After getting registered on the portal,the user is able to generate a csv file that they must share with the support team in order to configure mobilepay settings on the POS. the csv file can be accesses by login to the mobilepay portal with their own account and click on POS on the left side. After clicking on POS, click on export information on the right top. As a result a csv file will be downloaded and must be saved on the computer. The Csv file has the following information and the most important information that is needed for configuration is MobilePayMerchantVatNo MobilePayMerchantId MobilePayMerchantId MobilePayMerchantVatNo MobilePayPosName
description:
When a customer contacts us that they want to use mobilepay services on POS,the first step is that the customer must register the store on mobilepay portal.

The sign up link is shared as below and the customer uses their own credientals in order to get registered on the portal.

https://portal.mobilepay.dk/

After getting registered on the portal,the user is able to generate a csv file that they must share with the support team in order to configure mobilepay settings on the POS.

the csv file can be accesses by login to the mobilepay portal with their own account and click on POS on the left side.
After clicking on POS, click on export information on the right top.


As a result a csv file will be downloaded and must be saved on the computer.

The Csv file has the following information and the most important information that is needed for configuration is MobilePayMerchantVatNo


MobilePayMerchantId


MobilePayMerchantId


MobilePayMerchantVatNo


MobilePayPosName

title: Mobilepay-Beacon id
text: After the user get registered on mobilepay portal and has shared the csv file with the support team as discussed in the article Helpdesk : K3 Support (freshdesk.com) the next step is to specify a beacon id for that store.Beacon id is actually a sticker with a QR code and a specific id. The stickers with beacon id are ordered by DdD from mobilepay support and are already configured and ready to assign to a particular store.The stickers are in stock with the responsible local stock manager. The beacon id is unique for every POS,for example if a store has 2 POS,so they must get two seperate stickers/beacon id's. An example of the Mobilepay sticker is shared as below.
description:
After the user get registered on mobilepay portal and has shared the csv file with the support team as discussed in the article Helpdesk : K3 Support (freshdesk.com)

the next step is to specify a beacon id for that store.Beacon id is actually a sticker with a QR code and a specific id.

The stickers with beacon id are ordered by DdD from mobilepay support and are already configured and ready to assign to a particular store.The stickers are in stock with the responsible local stock manager.

The beacon id is unique for every POS,for example if a store has 2 POS,so they must get two seperate stickers/beacon id's.

An example of the Mobilepay sticker is shared as below.

title: Mobilepay Tools-Introduction
text: After getting MobilePayMerchantVatNo and beacon-id for a particular store,the next step is to configure mobilepay settings in Mobilepay Tools. Mobilepay Tools is a software that is designed for configuring DdD Pos with Mobilepay payments. Mobilepay Tools can be accessed on a computer named Teknik Rum through Teamviewer as shown. After login to the computer Teknik Rum,Mobilepay tools can be accessed on Deskop pic 1. Right click on the icon and open it as an admin. The window shown in pic 2 will appear. pic1: Pic 2:
description:
After getting MobilePayMerchantVatNo and beacon-id for a particular store,the next step is to configure mobilepay settings in Mobilepay Tools.

Mobilepay Tools is a software that is designed for configuring DdD Pos with Mobilepay payments.


Mobilepay Tools can be accessed on a computer named Teknik Rum through Teamviewer as shown.



After login to the computer Teknik Rum,Mobilepay tools can be accessed on Deskop pic 1.
Right click on the icon and open it as an admin.
The window shown in pic 2 will appear.


pic1:


Pic 2:

title: Mobilepay Tools-Configuration
text: As already discussed in the last articles in chapter Mobilepay DdD,The two important things for configuration are merchant vat No and beacon id. When the support team gets this information,so the store can be configured for Mobilepay feature using Mobilepay Tools. In Mobilepay Tools,we track the user by entering Merchant Vat No. In this case,I am assuming Merchant Vat No as: DK12279418. As we can see that the store is already configured with mobilepay on their 2 POS. the important information is highlighted. Pic 1: In case,the shop gets a new pos and they want to configure it for mobilpay payments,so we can easily click on the option Add POS,a new window will appear that asks the required information as shown. Enter the required details and press ok and you will observe that POS 3 is now configured for mobilpay payments. The setup DdD admin as shown in Pic 1 must be clicked and confirmed in ordered to transfer and copy all these information in DdD admin for this specific client. After completing this process,Please restart the computer,(in this case POS 3) and you will notice that the store is ready to receive payments using mobilepay feature. Pic 2:
description:
As already discussed in the last articles in chapter Mobilepay DdD,The two important things for configuration are merchant vat No and beacon id.

When the support team gets this information,so the store can be configured for Mobilepay feature using Mobilepay Tools.

In Mobilepay Tools,we track the user by entering Merchant Vat No.
In this case,I am assuming Merchant Vat No as: DK12279418.

As we can see that the store is already configured with mobilepay on their 2 POS.
the important information is highlighted.


Pic 1:


In case,the shop gets a new pos and they want to configure it for mobilpay payments,so we can easily click on the option Add POS,a new window will appear that asks the required information as shown.

Enter the required details and press ok and you will observe that POS 3 is now configured for mobilpay payments.

The setup DdD admin as shown in Pic 1 must be clicked and confirmed in ordered to transfer and copy all these information in DdD admin for this specific client.

After completing this process,Please restart the computer,(in this case POS 3) and you will notice that the store is ready to receive payments using mobilepay feature.
